        If hole filling is disabled.

      • bulkReadSize

        public int bulkReadSize
        Set the bulk read size.

      • beforeRpcHandler

        public Runnable beforeRpcHandler
        These two handlers are provided to give some control on what happen when system is down. For applications that want to have specific behaviour when a the system appears unavailable, they can register their own handler for both before the rpc request and upon network exception. An example of how to use these handlers implementing timeout is given in test/src/test/java/org/corfudb/runtime/CorfuRuntimeTest.java

      • systemDownHandler

        public Runnable systemDownHandler

      • overrideGetRouterFunction

        public static BiFunction<CorfuRuntime,String,IClientRouter> overrideGetRouterFunction
        When set, overrides the default getRouterFunction. Used by the testing framework to ensure the default routers used are for testing.

      • getRouterFunction

        public Function<String,IClientRouter> getRouterFunction
        A function to handle getting routers. Used by test framework to inject a test router. Can also be used to provide alternative logic for obtaining a router.

        public CorfuRuntime enableSaslPlainText(String usernameFile,
                                        String passwordFile)
        Enable SASL Plain Text.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the CorfuRuntime. Stops async tasks from fetching the layout. Cannot reuse the runtime once shutdown is called.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop all routers associated with this runtime & disconnect them.

      • stop

        public void stop(boolean shutdown)
        Stop all routers associated with this Corfu Runtime.

        Parameters:

      • setBackpointersDisabled

        public CorfuRuntime setBackpointersDisabled(boolean disable)
        Whether or not to disable backpointers
        Parameters:
        disable - True, if the cache should be disabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime to support chaining.

      • setCacheDisabled

        public CorfuRuntime setCacheDisabled(boolean disable)
        Whether or not to disable the cache
        Parameters:
        disable - True, if the cache should be disabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime to support chaining.

      • setTransactionLogging

        public CorfuRuntime setTransactionLogging(boolean enable)
        If enabled, successful transactions will be written to a special transaction stream (i.e. TRANSACTION_STREAM_ID)
        Parameters:
        enable - indicates if transaction logging is enabled
        Returns:
        corfu runtime object

      • parseConfigurationString

        public CorfuRuntime parseConfigurationString(String configurationString)
        Parse a configuration string and get a CorfuRuntime.
        Parameters:
        configurationString - The configuration string to parse.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime Configured based on the configuration string.

      • addLayoutServer

        public CorfuRuntime addLayoutServer(String layoutServer)
        Add a layout server to the list of servers known by the CorfuRuntime.
        Parameters:
        layoutServer - A layout server to use.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime, to support the builder pattern.

      • getRouter

        public IClientRouter getRouter(String address)
        Get a router, given the address.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the router to get.
        Returns:
        The router.

      • invalidateLayout

        public void invalidateLayout()
        Invalidate the current layout. If the layout has been previously invalidated and a new layout has not yet been retrieved, this function does nothing.

      • connect

        public CorfuRuntime connect()
        Connect to the Corfu server instance. When this function returns, the Corfu server is ready to be accessed.
